section:
Photon.Pun.UtilityScripts.ButtonInsideScrollList Class Reference Photon.Pun.UtilityScripts.ButtonInsideScrollList
Button inside scroll list will stop scrolling ability of scrollRect container, so that when pressing down on a button and draggin up and down will not affect scrolling.
Inheritance diagram for Photon.Pun.UtilityScripts.ButtonInsideScrollList:
Collaboration diagram for Photon.Pun.UtilityScripts.ButtonInsideScrollList:
Detailed Description
Button inside scroll list will stop scrolling ability of scrollRect container, so that when pressing down on a button and draggin up and down will not affect scrolling.
this doesn't do anything if no scrollRect component found in Parent Hierarchy.
